name: ComparatorChain_setComparatorTest
description: Unit tests for the setComparator method in the ComparatorChain class.

test_cases.name: testSetComparator_ForwardSort
test_cases.description: Tests setting a comparator in forward sort order in the ComparatorChain.

test_cases.name: testSetComparator_ReverseSort
test_cases.description: Tests setting a comparator in reverse sort order in the ComparatorChain.

test_cases.name: testSetComparator_LockedChain
test_cases.description: Tests setting a comparator in a locked ComparatorChain, expecting an UnsupportedOperationException.
